quizDescription: Test your knowledge of famous movie quotes and see if you can identify which movie they're from.

questions.question: Which movie features the famous line, 'Here's looking at you, kid.'?
questions.explanation: The iconic line 'Here's looking at you, kid.' is from the movie 'Casablanca' starring Humphrey Bogart and Ingrid Bergman.

questions.question: In which film do you hear the quote, 'You can't handle the truth!'?
questions.explanation: 'You can't handle the truth!' is a famous line delivered by Jack Nicholson in the movie 'A Few Good Men.'

questions.question: Which animated movie features the quote, 'To infinity and beyond!'?
questions.explanation: 'To infinity and beyond!' is the catchphrase of Buzz Lightyear in the animated film 'Toy Story.'

questions.question: In which classic film is the line, 'There's no place like home.'?
questions.explanation: 'There's no place like home.' is famously uttered by Dorothy in 'The Wizard of Oz.'

questions.question: Which action movie includes the quote, 'Yippee-ki-yay, motherf*****!'?
questions.explanation: 'Yippee-ki-yay, motherf*****!' is a memorable line spoken by Bruce Willis in the action-packed film 'Die Hard.'

questions.question: In which movie is the quote, 'I feel the need - the need for speed.'?
questions.explanation: 'I feel the need - the need for speed.' is a famous line from the movie 'Top Gun' starring Tom Cruise.

questions.question: Which romantic comedy includes the quote, 'I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.'?
questions.explanation: 'I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.' is a memorable line from the romantic comedy 'Notting Hill.'

questions.question: Which science fiction movie features the quote, 'May the Force be with you.'?
questions.explanation: 'May the Force be with you.' is a famous line from the epic 'Star Wars' franchise.

questions.question: In which film do you hear the quote, 'Here's Johnny!'?
questions.explanation: 'Here's Johnny!' is a chilling line from the horror classic 'The Shining,' starring Jack Nicholson.

questions.question: Which fantasy film includes the quote, 'You shall not pass!'?
options: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
questions.answer: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
questions.explanation: 'You shall not pass!' is a famous line from 'The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring' when Gandalf confronts the Balrog.
